name: DataMergeImagePlaceholders
shortdesc: A collection of data merge image placeholders.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a data merge image placeholder.

parameter.name: placeholder
parameter.shortdesc: The page item on which to place the placeholder.

parameter.name: field
parameter.shortdesc: The data merge field to insert.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new DataMergeImagePlaceholder &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the DataMergeImagePlaceholder.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholders within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The DataMergeImagePlaceholder, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: DataMergeImagePlaceholder, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The DataMergeImagePlaceholder, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: DataMergeImagePlaceholder, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the DataMergeImagePlaceholder that follows the desired DataMergeImagePlaceholder.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder whose index follows the specified DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The DataMergeImagePlaceholder whose index comes before the desired DataMergeImagePlaceholder.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every DataMergeImagePlaceholder in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DataMergeImagePlaceholder.
Returns the DataMergeImagePlaceholder with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
